structure.unit: RELIGIOUS, CHARITABLE, AND EDUCATIONAL SOCIETIES -- NONSTOCK, NONPROFIT CORPORATIONS

law.catch_line: Submission of block grant application to Legislative Research Commission -- Contents of application.

text.section: The state administering agency shall submit any block grant application under the federal act for the following fiscal year to the Legislative Research Commission no less than ninety (90) days prior to the date of submission, as required by federal law, of the block grant application to the federal administering agency. The application and other material submitted to the Commission shall conform to the requirements, standards and criteria prescribed in KRS 273.430 to 273.448 and KRS 45.351, 45.3511 and 45.353. The review and processing of the application shall be in conformance with the provisions of KRS 45.352, 45.353 and 45.354.

The state administering agency shall submit annually an actual use and distribution report to the Commission as provided by KRS 45.357. Furthermore, the state administering agency shall comply with the block grant status report requirements of KRS 45.357.

law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 308, sec. 14, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 453, sec. 13, effective July 15, 1982.
